Deletes the selected appointment from the Appointments table of the database and updates the Appointments table view to reflect the changes.

onSaveReturnBtn(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AddAppointment
Gets all user input, tests time input for errors, uses input to add a new appointment to the Appointment table of the database, and navigates back to Appointments page.
onSaveReturnBtn(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AddCustomer
Adds a new customer to the Customer table of the database.
onSaveReturnBtn(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ModifyAppointment
Changes an appointment in the Appointments table of the database based on the appointment selected to modify and the data entered by the user.
onSaveReturnBtn(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ModifyCustomer
Changes a customer in the Customers table of the database based on the customer selected to modify and the data entered by the user.

Fills the appointment table with a list of appointments by contact based on the selected contact.

Sets combo box for division info with list based on selected country.

Sets selectedMonth variable to the month chosen by the user.
